name: 1 - The Defiants
_source: speak;Fernando; And not a soul saw us.{w} Who knew it'd be so simple? Easy pickings for us!
speak;Alexis; Alright, bandits, get ready to feel the power of The Defiants' brawler in action!
speak;Fernando; You really like to flex that you're our brawler, don't you, Alexis?
speak;Alexis; I'm just about the only one of us with anything to flex.
speak;Fernando; Anyway, let's get moving.{w} We've no time to spare.
speak;Alexis; Hehe, I'm itching to punch an archer in the face!
speak;Nina; Sarah, Fernando and Alexis should be in place,{w} and our new friends should be out front.{w} We still going with the flank?
speak;Sarah; We brought our best gear, and no better opportunity will arise.{w} Once we finish the bandits, though,{w} I would like a word with our new friends.
speak;Nina; Now, let's get this started!{w} Soon they'll find out why they call me the Lawbreaker!
